Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 47-2714

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The per diem rate to be charged for skilled care patients at District of Columbia Village shall be $82.50.
The per diem rate to be charged for intermediate care patients at District of Columbia Village shall be $56.00.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
